name: BuyhatkeAssistant
0:
”Alexa, open buyhatke assistant”
”Alexa, ask buyhatke assistant”
”Alexa, launch buyhatke assistant”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: buyhatke assistant
des:
Buyhatke Assistant is on now Alexa. Currently, it offers two features.
1. Compare product prices: Say 'search iPhone 7s' or 'compare iPhone 7s prices' and it will give you prices of iPhone 7s on available e-commerce websites. Say 'more' to iterate through the list or say 'repeat' to hear the list again. 
2. Best deals on Flight: Either say 'book a flight' and let Alexa handle the rest or if you are in hurry say 'book a flight from Banglore to Delhi for tomorrow' and it will give you best flight deals available across all other available sites.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
